**获得能量药水**（potion of gain energy）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[药水](/wiki/%E8%8D%AF%E6%B0%B4 "药水")。

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 生成](#.E7.94.9F.E6.88.90)

- [2 描述](#.E6.8F.8F.E8.BF.B0)
  - [2.1 炼金术](#.E7.82.BC.E9.87.91.E6.9C.AF)

- [3 策略](#.E7.AD.96.E7.95.A5)

- [4 历史](#.E5.8E.86.E5.8F.B2)

- [5 消息](#.E6.B6.88.E6.81.AF)

- [6 Variants](#Variants)

  - [6.1 SLASH'EM](#SLASH.27EM)
  - [6.2 dNetHack](#dNetHack)
  - [6.3 NetHack Fourk](#NetHack_Fourk)
  - [6.4 FIQHack](#FIQHack)
  - [6.5 SlashTHEM](#SlashTHEM)

- [7 引用及注释](#.E5.BC.95.E7.94.A8.E5.8F.8A.E6.B3.A8.E9.87.8A)

## 生成

[巫师](/index.php?title=%E5%B7%AB%E5%B8%88\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "巫师 (page does not exist)")在游戏开始时获得的随机药水里有可能出现获得能量药水[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)。

## 描述

[饮用](/index.php?title=%E9%A5%AE%E7%94%A8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "饮用 (page does not exist)")获得能量药水会[锻炼](/index.php?title=%E9%94%BB%E7%82%BC\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "锻炼 (page does not exist)")玩家的[感知](/index.php?title=%E6%84%9F%E7%9F%A5\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "感知 (page does not exist)")，并改变玩家的当前能量值和最大能量值，效果根据药水[BUC](/index.php?title=BUC/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "BUC/zh-CN (page does not exist)")而定：祝福的药水会将最大能量值增加3d6点，并回复该数值3倍的能量，未诅咒的药水会将最大能量值增加2d6点，并回复该数值3倍的能量，诅咒的药水会将最大能量值减少1d6点，并使玩家流失该数值3倍的能量（最低降至0）。

### 炼金术

将获得能量药水与[治愈](/wiki/%E6%B2%BB%E6%84%88%E8%8D%AF%E6%B0%B4 "治愈药水")、[强力治愈](/wiki/%E5%BC%BA%E5%8A%9B%E6%B2%BB%E6%84%88%E8%8D%AF%E6%B0%B4 "强力治愈药水")或[完全治愈](/wiki/%E5%AE%8C%E5%85%A8%E6%B2%BB%E6%84%88%E8%8D%AF%E6%B0%B4 "完全治愈药水")药水[混合](/index.php?title=%E6%B5%B8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "浸 (page does not exist)")分别能够[调制](/index.php?title=%E7%82%BC%E9%87%91%E6%9C%AF\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "炼金术 (page does not exist)")出[强力治愈](/wiki/%E5%BC%BA%E5%8A%9B%E6%B2%BB%E6%84%88%E8%8D%AF%E6%B0%B4 "强力治愈药水")、[完全治愈](/wiki/%E5%AE%8C%E5%85%A8%E6%B2%BB%E6%84%88%E8%8D%AF%E6%B0%B4 "完全治愈药水")或[增强能力](/wiki/%E5%A2%9E%E5%BC%BA%E8%83%BD%E5%8A%9B%E8%8D%AF%E6%B0%B4 "增强能力药水")药水。将获得能量药水与[混乱药水](/wiki/%E6%B7%B7%E4%B9%B1%E8%8D%AF%E6%B0%B4 "混乱药水")混合会调制出[启蒙药水](/wiki/%E5%90%AF%E8%92%99%E8%8D%AF%E6%B0%B4 "启蒙药水")（1⁄3概率）或[酒](/wiki/%E9%85%92 "酒")（2⁄3概率）。

## 策略

施法玩家可能需要获得能量药水以在紧急情况下回复能量。多数玩家则更倾向于将获得能量药水用于[炼金术](/index.php?title=%E7%82%BC%E9%87%91%E6%9C%AF\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "炼金术 (page does not exist)")。

## 历史

获得能量药水最初于[NetHack 1.3d](/wiki/NetHack_1.3d "NetHack 1.3d")加入游戏。

[NetHack 3.4.3](/wiki/NetHack_3.4.3 "NetHack 3.4.3")及更早的版本中，获得能量药水的机制和现在不同：

- 受祝福的药水会将你的当前能量和最大能量增加7～11点。
- 未诅咒的药水会将你的当前能量和最大能量增加2～6点。
- 被诅咒的药水会将你的当前能量和最大能量减少2～6点。

在[NetHack 3.6.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.6.0 "NetHack 3.6.0")版本的[commit 37771f77](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/commit/37771f779e9431cc93a59e9e8ee71d367bcbd8c2)中，获得能量药水的机制修改为与现在版本相同。

## 消息

- 魔法能量流过你的身体。（Magical energies course through your body.）

  你喝下了非诅咒的获得能量药水。

- 你感觉无生气。（You feel lackluster.）

  你喝下了被诅咒的获得能量药水。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Potion_of_gain_energy/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

Variants based on NetHack 3.4.3 and earlier versions use the aforementioned old formula unless otherwise noted.

### SLASH'EM

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), quaffing a non-cursed potion of gain energy increases a character's current energy by 9 + 1d25, plus an additional 5 points if the potion is blessed, and the character's maximum energy is increased by 1d2, plus an additional 2 points if the potion is blessed - if this would put the character's current energy above their maximum energy, half of the difference is added to their maximum energy, and their current energy is set to this new maximum. A cursed potion instead decreases current energy by 9 + 1d25 and maximum energy by 1d2.

This makes the potion capable of restoring more energy compared to NetHack 3.4.3, but it is ideally best quaffed with full energy for the highest increase to maximum energy.

### dNetHack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), potions of gain energy follow NetHack 3.4.3 rules, but add or subtract a high additional amount from the quaffer's current energy: +200 for blessed potions, +100 for uncursed potions, and -100 for cursed potions. Monsters that are [cancelled](/wiki/Cancelled "Cancelled") will attempt to quaff the potion if they have one or find one in order to reverse the condition.

### NetHack Fourk

In [NetHack Fourk](/wiki/NetHack_Fourk "NetHack Fourk"), [sylph](/wiki/Sylph_\(starting_race\) "Sylph (starting race)") characters start each game with a potion of gain energy.

### FIQHack

In [FIQHack](/wiki/FIQHack "FIQHack"), quaffing a potion of gain energy (or any other source of energy gain) can cure a character's cancellation, and monsters that are cancelled will use the potion to cure their cancellation if possible.

### SlashTHEM

In [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"), in addition to SLASH'EM details, brewing a potion of gain energy with a [chemistry set](/wiki/Chemistry_set "Chemistry set") uses up three charges.

## 引用及注释

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [src/u\_init.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 166](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/u_init.c#L166)

生成

描述

饮用获得能量药水会锻炼玩家的感知，并改变玩家的当前能量值和最大能量值，效果根据药水BUC而定：祝福的药水会将最大能量值增加3d6点，并回复该数值3倍的能量，未诅咒的药水会将最大能量值增加2d6点，并回复该数值3倍的能量，诅咒的药水会将最大能量值减少1d6点，并使玩家流失该数值3倍的能量（最低降至0）。

炼金术

将获得能量药水与治愈、强力治愈或完全治愈药水混合分别能够调制出强力治愈、完全治愈或增强能力药水。将获得能量药水与混乱药水混合会调制出启蒙药水（1⁄3概率）或酒（2⁄3概率）。

策略

施法玩家可能需要获得能量药水以在紧急情况下回复能量。多数玩家则更倾向于将获得能量药水用于炼金术。

获得能量药水最初于NetHack 1.3d加入游戏。

NetHack 3.4.3及更早的版本中，获得能量药水的机制和现在不同：

  • 受祝福的药水会将你的当前能量和最大能量增加7～11点。
  • 未诅咒的药水会将你的当前能量和最大能量增加2～6点。
  • 被诅咒的药水会将你的当前能量和最大能量减少2～6点。

在NetHack 3.6.0版本的commit 37771f77中，获得能量药水的机制修改为与现在版本相同。

消息

魔法能量流过你的身体。（Magical energies course through your body.）
你喝下了非诅咒的获得能量药水。
你感觉无生气。（You feel lackluster.）
你喝下了被诅咒的获得能量药水。

Variants

Variants based on NetHack 3.4.3 and earlier versions use the aforementioned old formula unless otherwise noted.

SLASH'EM

In SLASH'EM, quaffing a non-cursed potion of gain energy increases a character's current energy by 9 + 1d25, plus an additional 5 points if the potion is blessed, and the character's maximum energy is increased by 1d2, plus an additional 2 points if the potion is blessed - if this would put the character's current energy above their maximum energy, half of the difference is added to their maximum energy, and their current energy is set to this new maximum. A cursed potion instead decreases current energy by 9 + 1d25 and maximum energy by 1d2.

Monsters that are cancelled will attempt to quaff the potion if they have one or find one in order to reverse the condition.

NetHack Fourk

In NetHack Fourk, sylph characters start each game with a potion of gain energy.

In FIQHack, quaffing a potion of gain energy (or any other source of energy gain) can cure a character's cancellation, and monsters that are cancelled will use the potion to cure their cancellation if possible.
